channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Liquibase Runner Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Liquibase Runner Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2285|2024-08-04T07:01:41.284Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20liquibase%20runner%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Liquibase Runner Plugin 1.4.7 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2020-2283|2024-08-04T07:01:41.417Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20liquibase%20runner%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Liquibase Runner Plugin 1.4.5 and earlier does not escape changeset contents, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by users able to control changeset files evaluated by the plugin.

item.title: CVE-2020-2284|2024-08-04T07:01:41.366Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20liquibase%20runner%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Liquibase Runner Plugin 1.4.5 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.
